{{Wired embedded system |brand=Olimex |model=A20-OLinuXino-MICRO |revision=n8GB |est_release_date=2016 |manuf_country=Bulgaria |is_manuf=Yes |type=single-board computer |flags=SD Card slot, Micro SD Card slot, GPIO, UEXT, HDMI, Audio In/Out (3.5mm), |pwr_v=6-16 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Allwinner |cpu1_model=A20 |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=8 GiB |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=29F64G08CBABA |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K128M16JT-125 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 2.0 (OTG), SATA |expansion_usb_num=3 |expansion_sata_num=1 |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL,, 4-pin header,, populated,, (115200,8,N,1), |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=SMSC |eth_chip2_model=8710A |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=128K Two-wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C128;;1;,,, PMIC;X-Powers Limited;AXP209;;1;,,, 3A, 1.5MHz, 28V Step-Down Converter;Monolithic Power;MP1584;;1;,,, }} {{TagLine|Development Board}} :[https://www.olimex.com/Products/OLinuXino/A20/A20-OLinuXino-MICRO/open-source-hardware Product Page]
*[https://linux-sunxi.org/Olimex_A20-OLinuXino-Micro ''Olimex A20-OLinuXino-Micro'' on '''SunXi''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Allwinner]]'' A20 (Dual-Core ARM Cortex-A7) @1 GHz *GPU: ''Mali-400'' *Memory: 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM • Micron *Onboard Storage: 8GB Micron NAND Flash, TF card (64GB)/MMC card slot, SD/SDHC/MMC Card slot *Ports: 1x FE LAN, 2x USB 2.0, 1x USB OTG, 1x SATA
===See also=== :;[https://www.olimex.com/Products/OLinuXino/open-source-hardware ''Olimex'' Products] • [http://linux-sunxi.org/Category:Community_Devices ''Olimex'' Devices] *[[Olimex OLinuXino-MAXI]] ([https://www.olimex.com/Products/OLinuXino/iMX233/open-source-hardware iMX233]) :[[Olimex OLinuXino-MICRO]] ([https://www.olimex.com/Products/OLinuXino/iMX233/open-source-hardware iMX233]) :[[Olimex OLinuXino-MINI]] ([https://www.olimex.com/Products/OLinuXino/iMX233/open-source-hardware iMX233]) :[[Olimex OLinuXino-NANO]] ([https://www.olimex.com/Products/OLinuXino/iMX233/open-source-hardware iMX233]) *[[Olimex A10-OLinuXino-Lime]] *[[Olimex A10s-OLinuXino-Micro]] *[[Olimex A13-OLinuXino]] :[[Olimex A13-OLinuXino-Micro]] :[[Olimex A13-OLinuXino WIFI]] *[[Olimex A13-SOM]] *[[Olimex A20-OLinuXino-Lime]] :[[Olimex A20-OLinuXino-Lime2]] *[[Olimex A20-OLinuXino-Micro]] :[[Olimex A20 MICRO 8GB]] *[[Olimex A20-SOM]] :[[Olimex A20-SOM204]] *[[Olimex A33-OLinuXino]] *[[Olimex A64-OLinuXino-1G]] *[[Olimex AM3352-SOM-EVB]] *[[Olimex ARM-USB-TINY-H]]
